Main Services

Web Development

Web Development

I program websites using HTML, Sass, JavaScript, and GitHub for version control. Every detail is checked and tested to ensure consistent functionality. If there's a specific feature you have in mind, let's talk about how to bring it to life!

Web Design

Web Design

I am experienced with Figma, CSS, Sass, and responsive web design. Need some custom content? I create graphics, SVGs, custom animations, and more. Finding the aesthetics that will emulate your brand's goals and style is a priority to me.

UI/UX

UI/UX

User experience matters! By learning the goals you have for your site, I plan and create great user experiences with intuitive, easy-to-use interfaces, layouts, and visual strategies that will grab attention and keep visitors engaged.

SEO & Performance

SEO & Performance

Knowing what search engines look for in websites is important to get more visitors to the site. I always keep SEO in mind while creating a site, and do full optimization and performance reviews before the site is launched.

Brand Strategy

Brand Strategy

Creating a digital strategy to grab the interest and keep the attention of your users is a must. During our meetings I can offer advice and ideas on how to best execute smart layouts, branding, and an effective call-to-action.

Hosting Set-Up

Hosting Set-Up

I will set up your website for you through shared hosting servers which offer reliability, affordable prices, and great performance. I will be available if you need help with updates or maintenance in the future!

See the process

Step 1

Consultation

Meet one-on-one with me to discuss the plans and goals you have for your website such as design, layout, content, and how we can work together to make it happen!

Step 2

Price Quote

Receive a quotation outlining my rates for the project, the payment plan we agreed upon, and an estimated total cost based on the approximate hours of work.

Step 3

Project Agreement

Receive a proposal agreement for the project outlining the details and plan discussed in the consultation, an estimated time of completion, and a copy of the terms of service.

Step 4

Provide Content

Provide the content you want to be on your website such as logos, images, videos, and text content. I will provide you with a content submission form for prompts and guidance!

Step 5

Easy Payments

Follow the payment plan as outlined in the quotation by paying weekly or by project milestones. Invoices will be sent electronically and can be paid via check or PayPal.

Step 6

Web Design

And so it starts! Your website will be designed using Figma. Consistent updates will be given along the way so you can request changes and give suggestions throughout the process.

Step 7

Design Review

When the website design is complete, you'll have the opportunity to either request more changes, or approve it to move forward into the development stage.

Step 8

Web Development

Once the design is approved, your website will be developed! Unless otherwise requested, your site will be coded with HTML, Sass (CSS), and JavaScript using GitHub for version control.

Step 9

Hosting Set-Up

I will offer guidance on how to purchase a shared-hosting plan, a domain, and how to add me as a developer. Then, I will handle the set-up for your site so it is ready for use!

Step 10

Final Review

You will have the chance to visit and review the website. During this time you can proofread content, test functionality, request design changes, and more!

Project Complete

Ready to Launch!

After any final changes are made, your website will be ready to launch! Need updates in the future? Simply contact me via email and we can discuss a plan.
